arcade.vis

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.Panel

  • public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for JFrame windows containing visualizations.

    Each JFrame object is generated by a Display object from the MASON library. Each Panel is a window that can contain one or more drawings made by Drawer objects. The Visualization creates all Panel objects, then attaches Drawer objects to their assigned Panel. Panel uses the Display2D class from the MASON library.

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.0

        title - the title of the panel
        x - the x position of the panel in pixels
        y - the y position of the panel in pixels
        w - the width of the panel in pixels
        h - the height of the panel in pixels
